{"id":922308757,"question_id":2716,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1679818471,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"80 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/922308757/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Prime Subtraction Operation","memory":"25.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> prime{2, 3};\n    void build(){\n        for(int i = 5; i < 1001; i++){\n            int j;\n            for(j = 0; j < prime.size() && prime[j] * prime[j] <= i; j++){\n                if(i % prime[j] == 0) break;\n            }\n            if(j >= prime.size() || prime[j] * prime[j] > i) prime.push_back(i);\n        }\n    }\n    bool primeSubOperation(vector<int>& nums) {\n        if(nums.size() == 1) return true;\n        build();\n        reverse(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int i;\n        for(i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++){\n            if(nums[i] < nums[i-1]) continue;\n            else{\n                int l = lower_bound(prime.begin(), prime.end(), nums[i] - nums[i-1] + 1) - prime.begin();\n                if(l == prime.size()) return false;\n                nums[i] -= prime[l];\n                if(nums[i] <= 0) return false;\n            }\n        }\n        for(auto i: nums) cout << i << ' '; cout << endl;\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"prime-subtraction-operation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
